This is the crap that pulls me right out of the game atmosphere.
Surrender is for people who don't want to get better. If it's to difficult to win a game then use that time to play against a harder opponent!

Riot is making an atmosphere for weak players.

tbh who really is going to use this unless the enemy team is like 5 diamond smurfs and you're not even sure if your team got 4 bronze players or whether you got bots. I highly doubt people is most elos will be able to get this sort of surrender in ranked.

A unanimous surrender is hard to get, even when your nexus is on 1hp and your team has been aced there is always one person who'll say no as a joke, so I don't think it'll be a big deal and the only times we'll really see it is with 5man premades. This surrender at 15min thing is a nice touch that probably won't ever be used but it was still worth adding.
i just used it in a game just like 5 minutes ago, its useful

tbh I think it will occur quite regularly. I have frequently experienced matches where players have experienced connection issues from the start of the game. We have not been able to /remake because they are connected but cannot surrender because they were connected until after the three minute mark. Then we have to sit around for 17 minutes and wait for a surrender. Though more commonly we will open a lane and let the opposition push the nexus down. 

Actually I would prefer <3min to do /remake, >3min but <15min /surrender but requiring a unanimous vote, and >15min the usual requirment.
